text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
This transmits revised IRM 2.4.48, IDRS Terminal Input, Command Code VPPIN.
(1) IRM 2.4.48 has been revised to include Program, Scope and Objectives.
IRM 2.4.48, dated May 11, 2020, is superseded.
LMSB, SB/SE, TE/GE, W & I.

VPPIN Error Indicators
) Overview: This IRM section provides an overview of the VPPIN Command Code. (

) Purpose: This IRM contains procedural steps for use of the VPPIN Command Code. Voice Processing Personal Identiﬁcation Number (VPPIN) is a Telephone Routing Interactive System (TRIS) command code. (

) Audience: These procedures apply to IRS employees who are responsible the processing of VPPIN records. These employees are located in the following areas: Large & Medium-Sized Business, Small Business/Self- Employed, Tax-Exempt & Government Entity’s and Wage & Investment. (
) Policy Owner: The Chief Information Officer (CIO) is responsible for oversee- ing all aspects of our systems that operate the nation’s tax infrastructure. (
) Program Owner: IT. (
) Primary Stakeholders: Large & Medium-Sized Business, Small Business/Self- Employed, Tax-Exempt & Government Entity’s and Wage & Investment. (

) Program Goals: This IRM provides the fundamental knowledge and proce- dural guidance for employees who work with VPPIN cases. By following the processes and procedures provided by this IRM, employees will process VPPIN cases in a manner that follows IRS policy and procedures while promoting the best interests of the Government. (
) This IRM and the contained sections provide the user the necessary informa- tion on how to use the command code VPPIN. (
) VPPIN was developed to give users Voice Processing as part of the Telephone Routing Interactive System (TRIS). (
) TRIS Project Lead is responsible for • Review and implementation of WRs that affect VPPIN • Updating the contents of this IRM (
) Program Reports: This process uses information received from the TMAC- MINI-COMPUTER to obtain the BASIC-ENT-REC (TIF
) from the TIF that matches the request from the TMAC-MINI-COMPUTER. (

) Program Effectiveness: Command Code VPPIN receives requests from the TMAC-MINI-COMPUTER to either scramble an incoming PIN (Personal Identi- ﬁcation Number) and update the TIF (Taxpayer Information File) with that PIN or retrieve a PIN from the TIF and unscramble it in order to send the PIN to the TMAC-MINI-COMPUTER. The process of VPPIN also writes a record END-OF-DAY processing via the Gendata tape to be sent to Master File. The scrambled PIN is sent to the TIF on the TIF
(ENT-IND-REC) and a TIF
Format

record (ENT-PND-CHANGE-TRANS-REC) is written. When a request is received from the TMAC-MINI-COMPUTER to research a PIN of zeroes, VPPIN will calculate a TAC (Taxpayer Access Code) using an algorithm. VPPIN

Policy Owner: The Chief Information Officer (CIO) is responsible for oversee- ing all aspects of our systems that operate the nation’s tax infrastructure.
Primary Stakeholders: Large & Medium-Sized Business, Small Business/Self- Employed, Tax-Exempt & Government Entity’s and Wage & Investment.
This IRM and the contained sections provide the user the necessary informa- tion on how to use the command code VPPIN.

Program Effectiveness: Command Code VPPIN receives requests from the TMAC-MINI-COMPUTER to either scramble an incoming PIN (Personal Identi- ﬁcation Number) and update the TIF (Taxpayer Information File) with that PIN or retrieve a PIN from the TIF and unscramble it in order to send the PIN back to the TMAC-MINI-COMPUTER. The process of VPPIN also writes a record to END-OF-DAY processing via the Gendata tape to be sent to Master File. The scrambled PIN is sent to the TIF on the TIF02 (ENT-IND-REC) and a TIF21 Format 11 record (ENT-PND-CHANGE-TRANS-REC) is written. When a request is received from the TMAC-MINI-COMPUTER to research a PIN of all zeroes, VPPIN will calculate a TAC (Taxpayer Access Code) using an
Command Code VPPIN sends an Error Indicator back to the TRIS automated phone system. The values are as follows:

VALUE MEANING: 0 Request Completed 1 Invalid TIN, FILE-SOURCE combination 2 TIF is not available 3 TIF AREA is not available 4 Account is not on TIF 5 Command Code deﬁner is invalid 6 Incoming PIN is not numeric 7 Other
